about_the_game:
Combat Demo


In this demo you can try the game combat mechanics, find and defeat the boss in the demo level.

Story


Meet Ethan, a man who awakens in a mysterious place with no memory of how he got there, except for his name. His companion is Sarah, a woman who is also in the same predicament. As they explore their surroundings, they realize that they are trapped in a terrifying purgatory.

Ethan is determined to uncover the truth behind their imprisonment and find a way to escape. However, as he delve deeper into the secrets of the purgatory, Ethan soon realize that there are dark and sinister forces at play. Will they be able to escape with their lives, or will they become trapped in the purgatory forever?

Innocents Purgatory is a bone-chilling first-person RPG, where you must use your wits and skills to uncover the mysteries of this hellish world. Explore every nook and cranny of the purgatory, uncover hidden secrets, and encounter terrifying creatures along the way. Will you be able to find a way out, or will you succumb to the horrors of the Purgatory?

Melee combat the evil spirits of the purgatory.


Use magic to gain an advantage over your opponents.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence and blood, General Mature Content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690 / AMD FX 4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3770 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Enter the terrifying world of Innocents Purgatory, a horror-themed first-person RPG that will keep you on the edge of your seat. With melee combat and magic at your disposal, you'll fight off evil spirits lurking in every corner. With Four different endings, your choices will determine your fate.
